text: Let Go is singer Avril Lavigne's first album. It was released on June 04, 2002. It has sold 16 million copies, making it Lavigne's best-selling album so far. ==Track listing== ;Original Edition #"Losing Grip" (Avril Lavigne/Clif Magness) – 3:53 #"Complicated" (Lavigne/The Matrix) – 4:03 #"Sk8er Boi" (Lavigne/The Matrix) – 3:23 #"I'm with You" (Lavigne/The Matrix) – 3:42 #"Mobile" (Lavigne/Magness) – 3:31 #"Unwanted" (Lavigne/Magness) – 3:40 #"Tomorrow" (Lavigne/Curtis Frasca/Sabelle Breer) – 3:48 #"Anything but Ordinary" (Lavigne/The Matrix) – 4:10 #"Things I'll Never Say" (Lavigne/The Matrix) – 3:43 #"My World" (Lavigne/Magness) – 3:26 #"Nobody's Fool" (Lavigne/Peter Zizzo) – 3:56 #"Too Much to Ask" (Lavigne/Magness) – 3:44 #"Naked" (Lavigne/Frasca/Breer) – 3:28 ;Japan Tour Special Limited Version (with a bonus DVD) # "Why" – 4:00 # "Complicated" (Video) # "Sk8er Boi" (Video) # "I'm with You" (Video) # "Day in the Life" (NYC Epk) ;Tour Edition # "Get Over It" ("Sk8er Boi" B-side) # "Why" ("Complicated" B-side) # "Unwanted" (Live) # "I'm with You" (Live) # "Nobody's Fool" (Live) ;Standard AU CD Enhanced Media Content *Bio *Video: "Complicated" - 4:12 *EPK - 5:55 *Bonus track: "I Don't Give" *Lyrics (plays song in background) **"Complicated" **"Sk8er Boi" **"Mobile" **"Unwanted" == References == Category:2002 albums Category:Avril Lavigne albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop rock albums
title: Let Go
